block.p: STARR-Manya (Fifi). Beloved wife of Amram Nowak. Loving mother of Adam, Barnaby and Alexandra. Loving grandmother of Robin, Zachary, Brittany and Tommy. Mother-in-law of Judy & Monica. Stepmother of Jeremy, Steve & Mara. Stepgrandmother of Miranda, Ariel, Cordelia & Jamie. Stepmother-in-law of Jim and Barbara. Friend of many. Services 11 AM, Friday, July 28 at Plaza Memorial Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue at 91st Street.
